s: March 10, 2025 - Bluefin Brands aka Bluefin Corp. was an American retailer based in Anaheim, California which specializes in collectible products such as toys, figurines and hobby kits from Japanese toy brands and various intellectual properties. s: Chogokin no Katamari (Absolute Chogokin) is a new Tamashii Brand realizing the quality and detail of Chogokin on a minimal scale. Each Absolute Chogokin figurine is a fixed pose die-cast mini figurine, produced in a single metallic color. The size of the figures in the series go from ~1" to ~3". NOTE: Due to the unique design of each figure, the actual size of the figure may be slightly smaller or bigger than stated.
